original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v WHERE pl.PostId = c.PostId AND c.PostId = ph.PostId AND ph.PostId = v.PostId AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-05-07 21:47:19' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 13:19:54' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4.PostId=E2.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2011-05-07 21:47:19' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 13:19:54'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E4E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E4E2.PostId=E3.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E2E3 WHERE E1.PostId=E4E2E3.PostId)
